thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Graeme Dixon

author: Graeme Dixon
title: Graeme Dixon
text:
Hose fittings quickly and easily "twist connect" on and off, with little effort and this must be the only hose connector solution that doesn't leak water and works as advertised. I particularly like the high quality plastics used in making Hoselink products and the swivel attachments that make hand hosing and sprinkler positioning easy.
I will be recommending Hoselink to my family and friends as I am now recommending to you.
